00017 
00019 // integer_max
00020 template<size_t Arg, size_t... Rest>
00021 struct integer_max;
00022 
00023 template<size_t Arg>
00024 struct integer_max<Arg> : std::integral_constant<size_t, Arg>
00025 {};
00026 
00027 template<size_t arg1, size_t arg2, size_t... Rest>
00028 struct integer_max<arg1, arg2, Rest...> : std::integral_constant<size_t,
00029     arg1 >= arg2 ?
00030     integer_max<arg1, Rest...>::value :
00031     integer_max<arg2, Rest...>::value>
00032 {};
00033 
00035 // contain
00036 template<typename T, typename... List>
00037 struct contain : std::true_type
00038 {};
00039 
00040 template<typename T, typename Head, typename... Rest>
00041 struct contain<T, Head, Rest...>
00042     : std::conditional<std::is_same<T, Head>::value, std::true_type, contain<T, Rest...>>::type
00043 {};
00044 
00045 template<typename T>
00046 struct contain<T> : std::false_type
00047 {};
00048 
00050 // index
00051 template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00052 struct index;
00053 
00054 template<typename T, typename First, typename... Ts>
00055 struct index<T, First, Ts...> : std::integral_constant<size_t, index<T, Ts...>::value + 1>
00056 {};
00057 
00058 template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00059 struct index<T, T, Ts...> : index<T>
00060 {};
00061 
00062 template<typename T>
00063 struct index<T> : std::integral_constant<size_t, 0>
00064 {};
00065 
00067 // index_type
00068 template<int N, typename... Ts>
00069 struct index_type {
00070     static_assert(N < sizeof...(Ts), LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00071     using type = typename std::tuple_element<N, std::tuple<Ts...>>::type;
00072 };
00073 
00075 // is_assignable
00076 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00077 struct is_assignable : std::conditional<std::is_same<typename std::decay<T1>::type, typename std::decay<T2>::type>::value,
00078     std::true_type, std::false_type>::type
00079 {};
00080 
00081 // const pointer
00082 template<typename T>
00083 struct is_assignable<T const*, T*> : std::true_type {};
00084 
00085 // double float convert
00086 template<>
00087 struct is_assignable<double, float> : std::true_type {};
00088 
00089 template<>
00090 struct is_assignable<float, double> : std::true_type {};
00091 
00093 // find_assignable
00094 template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00095 struct find_assignable;
00096 
00097 template<typename T, typename T1, typename... Ts>
00098 struct find_assignable<T, T1, Ts...> {
00099     using type = typename std::conditional<is_assignable<T1, T>::value, T1, typename find_assignable<T, Ts...>::type>::type;
00100 };
00101 
00102 template<typename T>
00103 struct find_assignable<T> {
00104     using type = void;
00105 };
00106 
00108 // has_assignable
00109 // template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00110 // struct find_assignable;
00111 //
00112 // template<typename T, typename T1, typename... Ts>
00113 // struct find_assignable<T, T1, Ts...> : std::conditional<is_assignable<T, T1>::value, T1, find_assignable<T, Ts...>>
00114 // {};
00115 //
00116 // template<typename T>
00117 // struct find_assignable<T> : std::conditional<true, EmptyType, EmptyType>
00118 // {};
00119 //
00121 // function_traits
00122 template<class F>
00123 struct function_traits;
00124 
00125 // function pointer
00126 template<class R, class... Args>
00127 struct function_traits<R(*)(Args...)> : function_traits<R(Args...)>
00128 {};
00129 
00130 // member function pointer
00131 template<class C, class R, class... Args>
00132 struct function_traits<R(C::*)(Args...)> : function_traits<R(C&,Args...)>
00133 {};
00134 
00135 // const member function pointer
00136 template<class C, class R, class... Args>
00137 struct function_traits<R(C::*)(Args...) const> : function_traits<R(C&,Args...)>
00138 {};
00139 
00140 // member object pointer
00141 template<class C, class R>
00142 struct function_traits<R(C::*)> : function_traits<R(C&)>
00143 {};
00144 
00145 // functor
00146 template<class F>
00147 struct function_traits : function_traits<decltype(&std::decay<F>::type::operator())>
00148 {};
00149 
00150 // raw function type
00151 template<class R, class... Args>
00152 struct function_traits<R(Args...)> {
00153 
00154     static constexpr std::size_t argument_size = sizeof...(Args);
00155 
00156     using return_type = R;
00157 
00158     template <size_t N>
00159     struct argument {
00160         using type = typename index_type<N, Args...>::type;
00161     };
00162 };
00163 
00164 } // end namespace basic
00165 } // end namespace lsf
